document.title: Sample Linker File
document.paragraph:
1Sample Linker File
2Step 1 /nodefaultlib:kernel32. lib /nodefaultlib:advapi32. lib /nodefaultlib:user32. lib /nodefaultlib:gdi32. lib /nodefaultlib:shell32. lib /nodefaultlib:comdlg32. lib /nodefaultlib:version. lib /nodefaultlib:mpr. lib /nodefaultlib:winmm. lib /nodefaultlib:winspool. lib /nodefaultlib:vfw32. lib /nodefaultlib:secur32. lib /nodefaultlib:oleacc. lib /nodefaultlib:oledlg. lib
2Step 2 UNICOWS. lib -SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS -OUT:unicode_demo.exe e1\emain. obj C:\Eiffel52\studio\spec\windows\lib\msc\wkbench. lib C:\Eiffel52\library\wel\spec\msc\lib\wel. lib
2Step 3 KERNEL32. lib ADVAPI32. lib USER32. lib GDI32. lib SHELL32. lib COMDLG32. lib VERSION. lib MPR. LIB WINMM. lib WINSPOOL. lib VFW32. lib OLEACC. lib OLEDLG. lib WSOCK32. lib UUID. lib OLE32. lib OLEAUT32. lib COMCTL32. lib unicode_demo. res C1\Cobj1. lib C2\Cobj2. lib C3\Cobj3. lib C4\Cobj4. lib C5\Cobj5. lib C6\Cobj6. lib C7\Cobj7. lib C8\Cobj8. lib C9\Cobj9. lib C10\Cobj10. lib C11\Cobj11. lib C12\Cobj12. lib C13\Cobj13. lib C14\Cobj14. lib C15\Cobj15. lib C16\Cobj16. lib E1\Eobj1. lib
